name: inactive shotgun turret
description: A modified version of the standard CROWS turret to use a semi-automatic shotgun. The magazine is small with a max capacity of 100 rounds but it's capable of using handloaded 00 shots.

name: inactive flamethrower turret
description: A modified version of the standard CROWS turret to use a flamethrower. The integrated tank can contain up to 10 liters of napalm or a full plastic jerry can.

name: inactive railgun turret
description: A modified version of the standard CROWS turret to use a railgun. The magazine is very small only capable of holding 50 rounds but it's compensate for the extra range of the turret.

name: inactive nailgun turret
description: A modified version of the standard CROWS turret to use a modified nail gun. The nails aren't shot with enough stopping power to pierce through armor but sheer amount of firepower sherds unarmored targets.
